title: [Large-scale] Language Inquiry Learning Design Through Technology Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning experience and proficiency in digital tool usage
context.additional_context: Utilization of technical tools for analyzing and modeling multilingual materials in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can generate three or more language-related inquiry questions using online collaboration tools
Learners can identify and explain two or more language data patterns using digital analysis tools
Learners can create prototypes visually representing language phenomena using virtual modeling tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
